It‚Äôs difficult to tell for certain what role climate change plays in any individual storm, but in the case of Hurricane Irma ‚Äî which hit the Keys in September 2017 ‚Äî there is little doubt that the warmth of the Caribbean Sea made the storm more powerful. https://t.co/UzJviGRLfK
